snippet: The Morgan Library & Museum’s first show of Spanish drawings covers four centuries with just 25 objects.
abstract: Karen Rosenberg reviews exhibit Visions and Nightmares: Four Centuries of Spanish Drawings at Morgan Library & Museum.
lead_paragraph: The Morgan Library & Museum’s first show of Spanish drawings covers four centuries with just 25 objects.

headline.print_headline: A Few Pearls of the Grisly and the Mundane
headline.seo: The Morgan Whips Through Four Centuries of Spanish Drawing
headline.main: A Few Pearls of the Grisly and the Mundane
